- agamathisunil daya alwisaagamika sahajiwanayen katayuthu kirima rate samagiya ha samaya thahawuru karaganimata rukulak wana bawa di. mu. jayarathna agramathya thuma pawasayi.budun wahanse deshana kota wadala dharmayata garu karana atharama sesu aagamwalata da garu kirimata awadhanaya yomu kala yuthu bawa da agramathya thuma sandahan kara sitiyeya.kolambaa galadari hotalayedi eeye pawathi samaya sandaha wu shri lanka aagamika samuluwedi me karunu sandahan kala agramathya thuma kumana aagamak adahuwath siyalu dena shri lankikayan ya yana sankalpaya yatathe siyalu dena ekathu wiya yuthu bawa da penwa dunneya.sambuddha shasanaya poshanaya kota aaraksha kirimata rajaya aandukrama wyawasthawen bandi sitina bawa pawasu agramathyathuma rate sesu aagamwalata da nisi thana demin ema aagamwala diyunuwata katayuthu kirima mahinda chinthanaye aramuna yayi da kiya.
